readable.title: 2930622766_fa8f84deb1
readable.content: A dark-haired , grey-suited man is leaning on a silver pole . A man leaning against a pole surrounded by people A man leans against a metal pole . A Middle Eastern man is standing with his back against a lamp post near to other people who are waiting around . Several people are standing on a sidewalk near a man leaning against a pole .
